QUERY_CLOB:
with aats as ( select case
                      when THEME_ROLLER_CONFIG is null 
                      then 'Y'
                      when (lower(trim(THEME_ROLLER_CONFIG)) like '%blink%'
                             or lower(trim(THEME_ROLLER_CONFIG)) like '%animation%') 
                      then 'N' 
                      else 'Y'
                      end pass_yn,
                      theme_number,
                      name, 
                      THEME_ROLLER_CONFIG,
                      created_by,
                      created_on,
                      last_updated_by,
                      last_updated_on,
                      theme_style_id,
                      application_id,
							        workspace
               from apex_application_theme_styles a)
select aats.pass_yn,                          
       aats.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       aats.created_by,
       aats.created_on,
       aats.last_updated_by,
       aats.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Theme Style `%0` (app %1) has inaccessible CSS', 
        p0 => aats.name, 
        p1 => aats.application_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Theme Style `%0` (app %1) has inaccessible CSS', 
        p0 => aats.name, 
        p1 => aats.application_id) issue_title,
       aats.theme_style_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aats.name,
       aats.THEME_ROLLER_CONFIG,
			 aats.workspace
from aats
where aats.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
EXPLANATION: WCAG 2.0/2.1 - 2.2.2 Pause, Stop, Hide - 2.3.1 Three Flashes or Below ThresholdChecking pages for inline CSS for blinking or animation logic
